remarks: The ring zero in a left module belongs to the ring base set. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmod0cl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lmod0cl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
lmod0cl.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
lmod0cl $p |- ( W e. LMod -> .0. e. K ) $.
